array.name: CREATE_TABLE_SQL
array.item: CREATE TABLE area (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,name TEXT)
CREATE TABLE desk (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,name TEXT,area INTEGER)

CREATE TABLE command (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,type INTEGER,desk INTERGER,goal INTERGER,direction INTERGER, speed INTERGER,music INTERGER,obstacle INTERGER,obstacle1 INTERGER,obstacle2 INTERGER,obstacle3 INTERGER,obstacle4 INTERGER, Error INTERGER,outime INTERGER,shownumber INTERGER,showcolor INTERGER)

CREATE TABLE robot (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT ,ip TEXT ,name TEXT ,outline INTERGER ,electric INTERGER , state INTERGER , commandnum INTERGER ,excute INTERGER , excutetime INTERGER ,commandstate INTERGER ,lastcommandstate INTERGER ,lastlocation INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE card (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,name TEXT,address INTERGER)
